it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.model

Interface PlayerBehaviour

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Player

    public interface PlayerBehaviour
    Interface to implements to describe the behaviour of the player during the game.
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        void shoot(int effect,
           WeaponCard weaponCard,
           java.util.ArrayList<InvolvedPlayer> involvedPlayers,
           ColorOfCard_Ammo[] priceToPay,
           java.util.ArrayList<PowerUpCard> powerUpToDiscard)
        Calls the method to use a weapon passing the parameter needed to complete correctly the attack.
        Parameters:
        effect - The number of the effect of the weapon that player wants to use.
        weaponCard - The weapon card that player wants to use.
        involvedPlayers - The list of the objects containing player or/and square involved in the effect.
        priceToPay - The price to pay to use the effect
        powerUpToDiscard - The list of power up cards that the player has decided to discard to contribute to the payment of the effect.

      • catchWeapon

        void catchWeapon(WeaponCard weaponCard,
                 java.util.ArrayList<PowerUpCard> powerUpCardToDiscard)
        Catch the weapon card from a spawn square during a catch action.
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - The weapon card that player wants to catch.
        powerUpCardToDiscard - The list of power up cards that the player has decided to discard to contribute to the payment for the weapon.

      • drawPowerUpCard

        void drawPowerUpCard(PowerUpCard powerUpCardsToDraw)
        Draw a power up card and put it on the deck of the player.
        Parameters:
        powerUpCardsToDraw - The power up card to draw.

      • useTargetingScope

        void useTargetingScope(Player playerToAttack,
                       PowerUpCard targetingScope,
                       ColorOfCard_Ammo ammoToDiscard,
                       PowerUpCard powerUpCardToDiscard)
        Uses the power up card targeting scope.
        Parameters:
        playerToAttack - The player to attack with the effect of targeting scope.
        targetingScope - The power up card to use.
        ammoToDiscard - The ammo to discard to pay the effect.
        powerUpCardToDiscard - The power up card to discard to pay the effect.

      • useTagbackGranade

        void useTagbackGranade(PowerUpCard tagback,
                       Player playerToAttack)
        Uses the effect of tagback granade.
        Parameters:
        tagback - The power up card that player decides to use.
        playerToAttack - The player who give the mark for the use of the effect of the tagback.

      • reload

        void reload(WeaponCard card,
            java.util.ArrayList<PowerUpCard> powerUpCardsToDiscard)
        Reloads a weapon chosen by the player.
        Parameters:
        card - The weapon card that player wants to reload.
        powerUpCardsToDiscard - The list of power up cards that the player has decided to discard to contribute to the payment of the reload.
